metadata.philosophy: Language acquisition is slow and invisible day-to-day. Milestones make progress tangible and celebrate the journey, not just the destination.

cyrillic.name: First Letter
cyrillic.message: You just unlocked your first letter! 32 more to go, but each one gets easier.
cyrillic.encouragement: The first step is the hardest. You're on your way.

cyrillic.name: Familiar Friends
cyrillic.description: Mastered all 7 letters that look like English
cyrillic.message: You've conquered the easy ones! Ğ, Ğ•, Ğ†, Ğ, Ğš, Ğœ, Ğ¢ are yours.
cyrillic.encouragement: These letters were free. Now the real learning begins.

cyrillic.name: False Friend Defeater
cyrillic.description: Mastered the tricky letters that look familiar but sound different
cyrillic.message: Ğ’, Ğ, Ğ , Ğ¡, Ğ£, Ğ¥ - the tricksters are tamed! Your brain has been rewired.
cyrillic.encouragement: This was the hardest part. Everything else is just new shapes.

cyrillic.name: Halfway There
cyrillic.message: You can now read over half the alphabet. Words are starting to make sense.
cyrillic.encouragement: Keep going - momentum is on your side.

cyrillic.name: Alphabet Unlocked
cyrillic.message: You can read Ukrainian! The entire written world of Ukrainian is now open to you.
cyrillic.encouragement: This is huge. You've given yourself access to 45 million people's written thoughts.

cyrillic.name: First Word
cyrillic.description: Successfully read your first complete word
cyrillic.message: You just read a word in Ukrainian! Let that sink in.
cyrillic.encouragement: Every fluent speaker started exactly where you are.

cyrillic.name: City Navigator
cyrillic.description: Can read all major Ukrainian city names
cyrillic.message: ĞšĞ¸Ñ—Ğ², Ğ›ÑŒĞ²Ñ–Ğ², ĞĞ´ĞµÑĞ°, Ğ¥Ğ°Ñ€ĞºÑ–Ğ² - you can read the map now.
cyrillic.encouragement: Geography becomes personal when you can read the names.

listening.name: First Listen
listening.message: Your first hour of Ukrainian input! This is how acquisition starts.
listening.encouragement: Every hour counts, even when you understand nothing.

listening.name: 10 Hours
listening.message: 10 hours of Ukrainian in your ears. Your brain is noticing patterns, even if you don't realize it yet.
listening.encouragement: At this point, familiar sounds are emerging from the noise.

listening.name: 25 Hours
listening.message: 25 hours! You're beyond 'tourist' level input. This is when patterns start clicking.
listening.encouragement: You probably recognize common words now without trying.

listening.name: 50 Hour Club
listening.message: 50 hours of input! Most people quit before this. You didn't.
listening.encouragement: Your colleagues' Ukrainian-accented English probably makes more sense now.

listening.name: Century
listening.message: 100 HOURS. You've put in more listening time than most 'learners' ever will.
listening.encouragement: You should notice comprehension jumping. Words you never studied make sense.

listening.name: Dedicated
listening.message: 200 hours. At your commute pace, this took most of a year. Incredible commitment.
listening.encouragement: You're approaching real comprehension. Keep going.

listening.name: Year of Ukrainian
listening.description: 365 hours - one hour per day for a year
listening.message: A full year's worth of daily listening. This is how languages are truly acquired.
listening.encouragement: You're no longer 'learning' Ukrainian. You're becoming someone who knows Ukrainian.

listening.name: Gone Native
listening.description: First time listening to native-speed content
listening.message: You just listened to what Ukrainians actually listen to. No training wheels.
listening.encouragement: Even if you caught 20%, that's real comprehension.

listening.name: Half Understanding
listening.message: You understand half of what you hear in real Ukrainian content!
listening.encouragement: This is the tipping point. Comprehension accelerates from here.

listening.name: Fluent Listener
listening.message: 80% comprehension of native Ukrainian. You UNDERSTAND this language now.
listening.encouragement: Production will follow naturally. You've done the hard part.

streaks.name: Week Warrior
streaks.message: A full week of daily Ukrainian! Habit forming.
streaks.encouragement: Consistency beats intensity. Keep showing up.

streaks.name: Monthly Master
streaks.message: 30 days in a row. This isn't a hobby anymore - it's a habit.
streaks.encouragement: A month of daily input rewires your brain.

streaks.name: Unstoppable
streaks.message: 100 days without missing. You're not 'trying to learn Ukrainian.' You're someone who listens to Ukrainian daily.
streaks.encouragement: Identity shift achieved. This is who you are now.

special.name: Bridge Moment
special.description: First time you understood something a colleague said in Ukrainian
special.message: You understood something! This is why you started.
special.encouragement: Every small moment like this will multiply.

special.name: Helper
special.description: First time your Ukrainian knowledge helped a colleague
special.message: Your Ukrainian helped someone. The investment is paying off.
special.encouragement: You're not just learning - you're building bridges.

special.name: First Ğ”ÑĞºÑƒÑ
special.description: Said 'Ğ”ÑĞºÑƒÑ' to a colleague for the first time
special.message: You spoke Ukrainian to a real person! That took courage.
special.encouragement: Their face probably lit up. Remember that feeling.

generic: Progress isn't always visible day-to-day, but it's happening.
Every hour of input is rewiring your brain.
You're not studying Ukrainian. You're acquiring it.
The path to fluency is just many small moments like this one.
Your future self will thank your present self for this consistency.
